name: Animus Predator
text: At the core of every creature lies the animating spirit that gives life or mobility, called the animus. The shaman sees the animus in the spirit world as one of the most fundamental forces required for life. Therefore, striking at or manipulating this spirit is akin to changing the very fiber of a creature’s being, turning a huge advantage into the weakness that brings about your enemy’s downfall.

features.breachingSpirit(11thLevel): Attacks made against any enemy adjacent to your spirit companion ignore insubstantial
features.predatorAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, one enemy adjacent to your spirit companion gains vulnerable 5 damage until the end of your next turn
features.spiritualPiercing(16thLevel): When you complete an extended rest, choose a damage type

flavorText: You might not realize it now, but this is really going to hurt.
